meanings.definition: A substance that aids in the digestion of food.
meanings.sent1: Digestants can help break down food in your stomach.
meanings.sent2: I always carry digestants with me in case I eat too much.
meanings.sent3: The digestants worked like little helpers in my tummy.
meanings.sent4: Her stomach welcomed the digestants like eager workers.
meanings.sent5: The digestants were like tiny chefs preparing the food for absorption.

meanings.definition: A medication that helps with digestion.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed digestants to improve my digestion.
meanings.sent2: I take digestants after meals to avoid stomach discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The digestants made my stomach feel like a happy camper.
meanings.sent4: His digestive system thanked him for the digestants' support.
meanings.sent5: After taking the digestants, my stomach felt at ease and ready to work.
